name: dagu
description: Dagu is a CSV-based task runner and scheduler that simplifies batch job orchestration with a web UI. It supports workflows, logs, retryable tasks, and file-based configurations for lightweight self-hosted setups.

features.title: File
features.description: Define workflows in simple CSV files. No database required

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Monitor and control jobs through browser. Visual workflow management

features.title: Retry Logic
features.description: Automatic retries for failed tasks. Resilient job execution

features.title: Workflow Support
features.description: Chain tasks with dependencies. Complex orchestration made simple

features.title: Execution Logs
features.description: Detailed history of all job runs. Full visibility and debugging

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Minimal resource usage for efficient operation. Perfect for any server
